actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 1 of H. Res. 1230. The next meeting is scheduled for 10:00 a.m. on January 3, 2023.
The House received a communication from Representative Butterfield wherein he resigns as a member of the House of Representatives effective at 11:59 p.m. on December 30, 2022.

Pursuant to Section 3(b) of the Public Safety Officer Medal of Valor Act of 2001 (42 U.S.C. 15202), the Speaker and the Republican Leader appointed the following member of the House to the Medal of Valor Review Board: Mr. O'Halleran.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 6 of H. Res. 1529, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Donald S. Beyer Jr. to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
